title: NRPLUS: It's a Good Time to Join
text:
Membership is inexpensive, and comes with a host of benefits, including a digital subscription to the magazine and participation in conference calls with writers and newsmakers. It also gets you into NR’s great Facebook group, which this week has been discussing everything from the Middle East to the Supreme Court to the Bernie Sanders campaign. You can sign up today.

Ramesh Ponnuru is a senior editor for National Review, a columnist for Bloomberg Opinion, a visiting fellow at the American Enterprise Institute, and a senior fellow at the National Review Institute. @rameshponnuru
description: Membership is inexpensive, and comes with a host of benefits. You should sign up today.
